name: Two (benrosen)
description:
Navigate pairs of unique mazes using the same sets of moves. Take advantage of teleporters, switches, and temporary traps to successfully complete both mazes as efficiently as possible.

Two is still in development and will continue to grow and change as time passes. It'll be free until later in development. The only thing I ask in return is that you provide feedback so I can make Two better.

Some upcoming features:

  • Animations
  • Dozens more puzzles
  • Controller support
  • A level editor
  • Music and SFX
  • Many more zones (waypoints, kill zones, etc.)

I work on Two by myself in the evenings.
